description:
With nBlocks you will be able to construct any project that resides in your mind using 2D blocks of various shapes. You can either use prepared templates and collect stars or start your own project from the beginning.


UNLIMITED POSSIBILITIES
To ensure each of your projects stands out, you can choose from 19 elements that you can fully rotate, duplicate, and customize their colors. Additionally, you can adjust the color of the board on which you arrange the blocks to suit your preferences.


CREATE YOUR OWN
Freestyle mode offers blank boards just waiting to be filled with blocks. This mode is perfect if you want to build a masterpiece from scratch all by yourself. No limitations, just you and your creativity.


KEY FEATURES:
- 96 templates in challenge mode
- Freestyle mode to unleash your creativity.
- 19 unique elements and 20 colors
- Relaxing music that helps to focus
name: nBlocks - Unblock Your Creativity
